-# syntax of the disabled algorithm string.
+# syntax of the disabled algorithm string. Besides, one additional
+# TLS-specific constraint can be used here:
+#
+#   TLSCipherConstraint:
+#     kx | authn
+#       This constraint restricts TLS cipher suite based on its algorithm usage:
+#         - "kx" prohibits algorithm to be used for Key Exchange.
+#         - "authn" prohibits algorithm to be used for Authentication.
+#       This constraint can't be chained by '&' with other constraints.
+#       Examples:
+#         - "RSA kx" prohibits any cipher suite that uses RSA algorithm for
+#            Key Exchange.
+#         - "DSS authn" prohibits any cipher suite that uses DSS algorithm
+#            for Authentication.
+#         - "NULL authn" requires some algorithm to be used for Authentication.
